EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Honeywell UV Cabin System
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/08/uv-cabin-system-webinar?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_americas_atr_hygiene&utm_content=webinar-invite&utm_term=a]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=friend}},
Air travel has entered a new era: a time in which improving cleanliness and building passenger and employee trust are more vital than ever. Honeywell is there to help, creating products that enhance confidence through the entire journey.
To introduce you to one of these important technologies we're hosting a webinar on Monday, August 10th at 10:00 a.m. CDT. This webinar will focus on the Honeywell UV Cabin System while introducing some other exciting offerings coming to the market soon.
You are cordially invited, along with your colleagues, to join us online for this important update as you look to return to normalized operations. We expect the webinar to last approximately 60 minutes.
We look forward to meeting you through our Honeywell UV Cabin System webinar. To register, please click on the link below.
Sincerely, Bob Lenz Director Offering Management, Safety Systems
DATE August 10, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. CDT
LOCATION Online and On-Demand Register Now <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/08/uv-cabin-system-webinar?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_americas_atr_hygiene&utm_content=webinar-invite]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
